title: 20min wait & u won't let me do anything
body: What is the point in making us stay on a message showing the time remaining every single low priority queue & not letting us doing anything? Atleast let us read the damn patch

replies.body:
P U N I S H M E N T

ðŸ™ƒ

Because it's a punishment. They want you to suffer so that you won't repeat your negative actions.

Then again, you can up the internet and watch some YouTube, chill on the OCE Boards, or whatever you want to do to pass the time.

If you want to read the patch notes, open your web browser and go to http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/
